Text: hi mike! thanks so much! how about a slowteasinghandjob library..

I wrote to Mike the other day asking for the same videos.  He wrote back:  "Had a 2-terabyte drive go south on me and have spent the last six days using Data Rescue to retrieve all the movies.  It is almost done.  Once I check the movies and make sure they are complete and viewable I will put-up A Library Torrent.  Reluctant Young Men are on the list!"

Hi Guys, it may take a while for the Reluctant Men stuff.  At the moment it has only recovered about 10%.  It will, eventually, be recovered.  It was one of the early 2TB Western Digital drives. Never trust WD.  Always go with Hitachi.  When you buy a Mac or an IBM machine they rely on Hitachi.
